cu.explanation_en: Setting GNB_IPV4_ADDRESS_FOR_NG_AMF to an invalid IP address format 'invalid_ip' will cause network interface configuration failure and prevent AMF communication.

du.explanation_en: Setting local_n_portc to 0, which is an invalid port number, will cause SCTP connection establishment failure between MAC and RLC layers.
du.explanation_zh: 將 local_n_portc 設定為 0，這是一個無效的連接埠號碼，會導致 MAC 和 RLC 層之間的 SCTP 連接建立失敗。
